msg: Removed getField() methods because they were too limited to be useful.

msg: Changed Mapper.findAllObjects() to return a Collection instead of a List
because the objects aren't necessarily ordered.

msg: Removed toBoolean() and toInt() because JDBC drivers handle these

msg: Added default constructor, get/setDataSource(), and createMapperException().

specific exceptions based on the SQLState and ErrorCode of an

author: dgraham
msg: Added executeUpdate() method that takes no replacement
parameters for executing things like DELETE FROM table_x.
